131.content: how will the Snow white Ninja girl expand?
131.title: Yumi

13111.content: how will Yumi put on the extra pounds?
13111.title: Weight gain

131112.content:
Yumi woke up find that she was bound to a chair.
"Mmm?" she said, realizing the predicament she was in.

She struggled a bit, only to realize that she couldn't break the rope that she was tied with. Her ice powers didn't seem to be working, either.

Yumi looked around and tried to calmly asses the situation. She was in a dark room of some kind, with the only light in the room being directed at her. She couldn't see anything, except for a table with a cloth draped over it. The aroma of several different dishes came from underneath the cloth to greet Yumi's nose. Whatever was under that cloth smelled delicious.

"Oh? Finally awake, are we?"

A shadowy figure in a pink suit walked towards Yumi.

"Haruka? W-what's going on right-kyaaa!"

Yumi was interrupted by a different figure wrapping measuring tape around her breasts out of nowhere.

While Yumi couldn't see the figure, she could hear the sound of gears clanking from it. It must've been one of Haruka's puppets.

The puppet then proceeded to measure Yumi's waist and hips.

"Oh? Wondering what's going on, eh? Well, you see, I've decided to conduct a little experiment. The Crimson Squad is a little bit short on money, and I'm trying to discover a chemical that I can mix into our food that will make us feel full, even if all we eat is, say, a small bit of grass. Underneath this table is a variety of dishes mixed with a variety of different blends of this chemical. I want to try and discover which one won't make whoever eats it fat. I can't exactly do this to any of my teammates, so I figured that making you into my personal Guinea Pig should be alright. Any questions so far?"

Yumi blankly stared at Haruka.
"Two, actually. Why don't my powers work, and if you're too poor to buy too much food, then where'd you get all of the stuff underneath that cloth?"

"Good questions, sweetie! The sedatives that I knocked you out with also takes away your powers. You can have the antidote if you cooperate. As for the food, well, let's just say that I've been sneaking some cash out of Team Crimsons food fund for this little venture of ours. So, are you ready?"
131112.title: Experiment time!

info.brief_description: watch as Girls from Senran Kagura get big and large in many different ways
info.description:
Senran Kagura (閃乱カグラ?) is a side scrolling action video game series produced by Marvellous Entertainment for Nintendo 3DS. Senran Kagura is a side scrolling action game for the 3DS. The player will assume the control of 5 different female ninja characters. The more they are damaged by enemies, the more their clothes are torn off (as like in most fanservice-y anime/manga). The main focus of Senran Kagura are the aspects of ninja and the integration of such into a high-school/modern day setting as the female cast secretly train the ninja arts.


+Fetishes that can appear during this story...+
- Stuffing/Weight Gain
- Pregnancy
- body expansions(Breast, Belly, Butt, or all)
- gaintess
- Vore


Standard rules apply...
- Only female characters are to expand. Although this doesn't exclude male characters from appearing at all in the interactive.
- Please put forth effort in your chapters.
- Nothing completely outlandish in regards of expansion.
- Let's try to avoid the overly gross situations such as toilet stuff and the like. Burps are fine (farts too, if you play it for comedy), but nothing past that please.
- This is an 18+ interactive so sexual situations are allowed, just...try not to go overboard with them. Use in moderation, basically and try not to have the story revolve too much around it.
